commit message: Use version of addHeader that takes only a view
Open filter edit activity when header is selected
Remove extra newline
Mark service variable as final
Only open files with non-empty SHA-1 and name

Guard against null list view in onScroll listener

NPE crash reported at this location

Add helper to call notifyDataSetChanged on root adapter

Guards against a possibly null root adapter

Update German translation for new tab titles

CLoses pull request #213

Update zh-rCN locale

Closes pull request #215
Remove duplicate strings

Add tab titles to Slovak locale

Closes pull request #216

Remove & from values-pt/strings.xml

Closes pull request #217

Update French translation

Closes pull request #219
Remove unused strings

Throw cancel exception if activity if finishing

This will occur if multiple loaders trying to access
an account back to back and the first login activity is
cancelled causing the parent activity to be cancelled
so the second loader shouldn't reopen a new login
activity.
Disable dragDrop config option

Call refresh() on editor after setting contents

Closes issue #222
Upgrade to 1.4 for next release
Upgrade user agent version to 1.4

Only allow item selection if orgs are non-empty

The org count being empty means they did not successfully
load so don't allow further navigation in this case.
